import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import "./style.css"; import * as evalueteApi from "../apis/evaluete"; export default function Index(props) { const [trungbinh, setTrungbinh] = useState(0); const [list, setList] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { evalueteApi.getEvaluete(props.product.masanpham) .then((success) => { if (success.status===200) { setList(success.data.value.$values); var sum =0; for (var i = 0 ; i < success.data.value.$values.length ; i++){ sum+= success.data.value.$values[i].sosao; } setTrungbinh(sum/success.data.value.$values.length ||0); } }) .catch((error)=>{ console.error(error); }) }, [props.product.masanpham]) return (
